title: Proxy Singed - What happens when your jungler near your lane and asks for a leash?
body:
If you agree, you miss your proxy; goodbye Corrupting Potion. If you don't you might cause him to rage and tilt. 

How do you guys deal with this scenario?

replies.body:
You lane the first 1-3 waves, push him to tower. Stroll past him while flashing mastery symbol and start to proxy.
A back in between to pick up seal or potion can be nice.

"You lane the first 1-3 waves" --- sometimes the matchup is superhard like if I'm up against a ranged champion. 

"A back in between to pick up seal or potion can be nice." I usually go Refillable and Seal first then go back to buy a Corruption Potion. I then TP back if the enemy is pushing hard.
Going Dorans Shield against ranged can be nice.Tho counter-intuitive.
You're brave dude, playing singed gets people banned.
I get that a lot haha!

You give him a leash if he is going to start near you.  Proxying is a strategy but its not the only strategy.  A good portion of League is being adaptable to the situation of the game.
This need for adaptability is especially true if you are playing Singed.

Singed is my fav top lane team carry :c I'm sad about this whole thing....and just leash ur jungler and make sure he doesn't make you tank it and proxy after your first back instead,I only proxy when I see a good oppurtunity,not always and make it predictable

Hmmm this is a new one. I will definitely try this. Thanks!

I can foresee a problem with this though; Singed is very weak in the first few minutes of the laning phase against champions who can kite him forever. Any advice regarding matchups like these?
Level 1 proxy is rough nowdays anyways. Better to start proxy after first or second wave.
Yeah. But if you start after second wave won't you miss a wave?
I tell my RL friends this. I never tried it with randoms. Thanks!
